first_name.description: The first name of the receiving address

local_time_window_start.title: Time Window Start
local_time_window_start.description: Time Window Start in seconds, relative to the route start date (midnight), UTC time zone. It is relative to start date because start time changes would shift time windows

local_time_window_end.title: Time Window End
local_time_window_end.description: Time Window End in seconds, relative to the route start date (midnight), UTC time zone. It is relative to start datebecause start time changes would shift time windows

address_phone_number.description: The phone number for the address

address_city.description: The city the address is located in

address_state_id.title: Address state id
address_state_id.description: The state the address is located in

address_country_id.title: Address country id
address_country_id.description: The country the address is located in

address_zip.title: Address zip
address_zip.description: The zip code the address is located in

schedule.title: Schedules
schedule.description: Array of the trip schedules to a location

items.title: Schedule
items.description: A trip schedule to a location

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.descripton: If true, a location schedule is enabled during construction of a hybrid optimization

from.title: From
from.Description: When schedule will be started from

daily.description: Daily schedule if the mode 'daily' was chosen
daily.title: Daily

weekly.title: Weekly
weekly.description: Weekly schedule if the mode 'weekly' was chosen

every.title: Every
every.description: Repeat every week next N days

monthly.title: Monthly

every.title: Every
every.description: Repeat every month next N days

dates.title: Dates
dates.description: Array of month days for monthly schedule if the mode 'dates' was chosen

nth.title: NTH
nth.description: Monthly schedule option if the mode 'nth' was chosen

n.title: N
n.description: Which day of the time period, 1: 1st, 2: 2nd, 3: 3rd, 4: 4th, 5: 5th, -1: Last

what.title: What
what.description: What time. 1: Monday, 2: Tuesday, 3: Wednesday, 4: Thursday, 5: Friday, 6: Saturday, 7: Sunday, 8: Day, 9: Working Day, 10: Weekend

annually.title: Annually
annually.description: Annually schedule if the mode 'annually' was chosen

every.title: Every
every.description: Repeat every year next N months

items.description: A month number in the year

nth.title: NTH
nth.description: Annualy schedule option if 'use_nth' is true

n.title: N
n.description: Which day of the time period, 1: 1st, 2: 2nd, 3: 3rd, 4: 4th, 5: 5th, -1: Last

what.title: What
what.description: What time. 1: Monday, 2: Tuesday, 3: Wednesday, 4: Thursday, 5: Friday, 6: Saturday, 7: Sunday, 8: Day, 9: Working Day, 10: Weekend

schedule_blacklist.title: Schedule blacklist
schedule_blacklist.description: Array of the dates, which should be excluded from a trip schedule to a location

items.description: A date in the string format. e.g. '2017-02-20'

service_time.title: Service time
service_time.description: Consumed service time at an address.

address_stop_type.description: The type of stop that this is (DELIVERY,PICKUP,BREAK,MEETUP,SERVICE,VISIT,DRIVEBY)

address_cube.description: The cubic volume of the cargo being delivered or picked up at the address
